name: Touch
description: Sit/stand touching (0 m) one or more individuals

name: 0-2 meters
description: Sit/stand within 2 meters of another individual (non-contact)

name: 2-6 meters
description: Sit/stand within 2-6 meters of another individual

name: Groom
description: Actively groom another individual

name: Approach
description: Approach another individual (within 2 meters) who then does not move away (within 20 seconds)

name: Other Social
description: Any other social behavior not defined in above categories

name: Contact Aggression
description: Aggressive behaviors involving physical contact including attacking, biting, non-sexual mount, grabbing, hitting, etc.

name: Non-contact Aggression
description: Aggressive behaviors directed towards another individual that do not involve physical contact including, chase, lunge, yawn, eye-flash

name: Displace/Supplant
description: Move towards an individual within 2 meters that then moves away

name: Other Agonistic
description: Any other agonistic behavior not defined in the above categories

name: Copulate
description: Intromission not terminating in ejaculation

name: Feed/Forage
description: Actively searching for, manipulating, and/or ingesting a food

name: Yawn
description: Open mouth to full gape, usually facing perpendicular to recipient, threat usually given by adult male

name: Eye-flash
description: Raise eyebrows exposing pink eyelids, threat display

name: Tail Lift
description: Raise tail, exposing perineal region

name: Scream
description: Emit high pitched sound, often in response to threat

name: Early-estrus
description: Slight turgescence of perineal skin

name: Peak-estrus
description: Peak turgescence of perineal skin (D1 to D3)

name: Deflating
description: Deflating turgescence of perineal skin (D-day or D0)

name: First trimester
description: Months 1-2 of pregnancy
